lines.text: Have you ever kicked or punched anybody in your entire life?

There are two types of bugs in this world. One comes from dirt another comes from society. If the bugs from the dirt bite you, you go sick. But if bugs from society bite you, whole society gets sick. You can cill the bugs from dirt, but the society bugs you can't.
Bring a paper, pen, and an inkpot, so I can write my heart to your possession...
O my sweetheart, I swear to you, I have been born for you...
We love one another, we always want to be together...
Juma you had promised to kiss me next friday, today is friday, so come on and give me a kiss...
